recommend you=
 bring a bathing suit... Kinda liquid around here.

As soon as he closed hi=
s commlink, a roll of thunder grumbled right on
top of Doc. A second later,=
 water was pouring down on him. For once,
he was glad he was made out of st=
ainless steel.

h with
